headline: Zoetis Declares First Quarter 2026 Dividend; Board Approves 6% Payment Increase
summary: PARSIPPANY, N.J., December 11, 2025--The Board of Directors of Zoetis Inc. (NYSE:ZTS) has declared a dividend of $0.53 per share for the first quarter of 2026, an increase of 6% from the quarterly dividend rate paid in 2025. The dividend will be paid on Tuesday, March 3, 2026, to all holders of record of the Company’s common stock as of the close of business on Tuesday, January 20, 2026.
